turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hi how can I help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want to order a cup of coffee from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, a medium cup of coffee.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Got it. and which starbucks did you want your medium coffee from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want it from Starbucks at Venetucci Boulevard 600, Colorado Springs.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay got it. I'll place your order now. You'll get the reciept via text.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, I need a little honey and whipped cream.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it. that's a coffee with honey and whipped cream.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, and you add some skimmed milk, too.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay no problem. I'm ready to finish the order. anything else?
